lead_paragraph: After shooting two turnpike employees at a toll plaza, the retired trooper was killed trying to unload money from a toll-collection vehicle, the police said.

headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Three Are Killed in Thwarted Heist by Ex-Trooper
headline.main: Pennsylvania: Three Are Killed in Thwarted Heist by Ex-Trooper

snippet: After shooting two turnpike employees at a toll plaza, the retired trooper was killed trying to unload money from a toll-collection vehicle, the police said.
abstract: Court records show retired state trooper Clarence Briggs, who fatally shot turnpike employees Danny Crouse and Ronald Heist during botched robbery in Harrisburg, Pa, area, had filed for bankruptcy protection in March 2015; Briggs was later killed by trooper while trying to unload money from toll-collection vehicle.
